subject: Art & Design
title: Responsive Typography: Scaling Text for Every Screen
description: A short lesson to help you apply Responsive Typography: Scaling Text for Every Screen.

hook.text: A headline that looks perfect on desktop can overflow on a phone screen or feel tiny on a TV.

buildup.text: Responsive typography adjusts size, line-height, and spacing based on viewport width.

discovery.text: CSS clamp() lets you set a minimum, preferred, and maximum font size in one line of code.

twist.text: Line length matters more than font size. A readable column width is the real responsive goal.

climax.text: Modern design systems define type scales â€” a set of harmonious sizes that work across breakpoints.

punchline.text: Don't just shrink the text. Redesign the rhythm.
